title: Students At An Oxford College Remove The Queen's Portrait, Citing Colonialism
content:
1. Students At An Oxford College Remove The Queen's Portrait, Citing Colonialism  NPR
  2. Removal of Portrait of The Queen at Oxford University Sparks Heated Debate | Good Morning Britain  Good Morning Britain
  3. Queen Elizabeth II's portrait pulled from Oxford college, new uproar ensues over 'cancel culture'  USA TODAY
  4. When 10 woke students feel bold enough to cancel the Queen for ‘colonialism’, Britain faces a battle for its soul  RT
  5. No-one actually cares what students think – we should just ignore them  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
